description: STRING No. 60 // From 2020-07-01 // This painting resembles a landscape that is somehow morphed and set up in a distorted grid. It was done during research in Artificial Intelligence and computer-generated landscapes and this painting is an attempt to process the findings. The flower-like symbols are interpretations of Merkle Trees.
materials: silkscreen paint base and interference paint on canvas
name: I Owe yoU I/IV
